text: Diocese of Požega may refer to: * Serbian Orthodox Diocese of Požega, former diocese (eparchy) of the Serbian Orthodox Church, in Slavonia (Croatia). * Roman Catholic Diocese of Požega, current diocese of the Catholic Church, in central Slavonia (Croatia). ==See also== *Požega *Eastern Orthodoxy in Croatia *Catholic Church in Croatia *Diocese of Zagreb (disambiguation) *Diocese of Zadar (disambiguation) *Diocese of Šibenik (disambiguation)
title: Diocese of Požega
